website_summaries.verdict: The Gel Excite 3 remains to be a serviceable option for low-mileage runs as it has excellent cushioning, great flexibility, and moderate arch support. Runners who are looking for a budget-friendly trainer that works reliably well should give this neutral running shoe a good look.
pros: The comfort continues in the 3rd iteration of the Asics Excite because of the plush padding and soft inner lining
The overlays do a very good job of keeping the foot secure through every stride
Several runners liked the vertical and horizontal flex grooves for superb flexibility despite the substantial cushioning
The wide and open mesh of the Asics Gel Excite creates maximum breathability
cons: There were many who wanted better durability in this shoe
A few runners developed hot spots because of the stitching

customer_reviews.title: "I would recommend the ASICS Gel Excite 3 for anyone looking for a supportive shoe that will get them through long days."
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to wear for work, where I can spend over 12 hours at a time on my feet. The first weekend (Friday through Sunday) that I wore them I put in a 15, a 14, and a 12 hour day for a combined 28 miles of walking on uneven asphalt, concrete, and gravel. My feet felt as well as could be expected with no swelling, blisters, or abnormal aching. I would recommend the ASICS Gel Excite 3 for anyone looking for a supportive shoe that will get them through long days. Great shoe for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. They are great! I walk 5 miles every morning at 5 AM in the shoes and they are very comfortable. They are light and fit excellent. I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone who does a lot of walking or running. UPDATE: I have walked 402 miles in these shoes since my initial review. The shoes are perfect, there is No Wear on the soles at all. That is Amazing! The whole shoes are still like the day they were delivered. These shoes are Great! I Love these running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Laneabby

customer_reviews.title: A well made and nice looking running shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. I wear a size 10 D and have high arches. With regards to the width sizing... Running shoes are designed to adjust the width fit depending on how tight the laces are. I loosen the laces to fit the width of my foot. No problem. I also like the Asics Gel technology. (I have worn Asics Volleyball shoes for years). It does a good job at form fitting your feet and providing shock cushioning without feeling squishy. The shoes are also light.
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Sills

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: This pair lasted me a year. Durable and at a good price. If you're a moderate jogger (1-5miles), get them, you won't regret it. Oh, and I got these a size up, which is my mistake, so if you have wide feet, just get them wide and do not go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Best Out of The Box !
customer_reviews.text: Hi there, please note that I have "Better - higher priced" Asics for running and serious walking, these Excite 3's are my daily shoes (errands, chores, etc...) I have tried all the major brands through the years, and for me, Asics always feel the best right out of the box - instant comfort ! Nike's and Adidas are always tight, New Balance are pretty good, but Asics is on top, may be my specific foot size and shape, but there it is....
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These arrived new in box. The hubby loves them for work, says they are very comfortable, like your walking on air. These are a true fit. I asked him for his honest opinion and all he said was... They are awesome, light weight, like I could use them all day long without the feet hurting.
customer_reviews.author: YuRo

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe, Minor Defect
customer_reviews.text: Used for walking, not running. After a few months of light to moderate wear, part of the sole started to lift off. One of the squares of blue traction is lifting off. Not sure what glue I can use to re-attach it.
customer_reviews.author: MTE

customer_reviews.title: he said they are the most comfortable sneakers he owns
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend when he goes to the gym, he said they are the most comfortable sneakers he owns. He did say they felt a little snug towards the toe, but he is used to wearing his shoes on the larger side that have a round toe. Now that he broke them in, he hasn't mentioned anything about them being uncomfortable since. He likes that they provide a bounce when running on the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but NOT Durable!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable, and I really like the appearance, but the soles are already peeling off and I've worn them less than a month. I don't use them for running, so they really don't have many miles on them, and I don't wear them every day. Very disappointed and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. For the money, you can't beat the comfort level. I just hope they hold up for a long time since that seems to be the only complaint about these shoes. For now, I'm using these as a gym shoe. I will update when I start running in them to see if they last or have any issue while running.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Pridgin

customer_reviews.title: ... husband says that these are by far the most comfortable shoes he has ever owned
customer_reviews.text: My husband says that these are by far the most comfortable shoes he has ever owned. This is the 2nd pair I've bought for him, and they were about half the price here on Amazon. He says he doesn't even have to wear his orthotic inserts in them. And he raved about the blue color of them, as he likes unconventional shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Charity O.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My husband runs in ASICS and I was hesitant about purchasing shoes online. They arrived before I got home and he already had them on running around when I got there. ASICS are pretty consistent on their shoe size. He said they were perfect, fit as good as the pair he was replacing (which he did not want to give up). Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal :)

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Nike's I bought
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased some Nike's, but they had no support. These are exactly what I expected--nice support and comfortable to walk in. Plus, they are not expensive. Now, I do not run in them, so I cannot attest to their support while jogging, but I'm guessing they would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who are familiar with Asics fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and basic. You can match gray with almost anything. I've been buying Asics running shoes for six or seven years now, so I know how they'll fit. Details: I don't run on a regular basis. These are for at the gym, walking to and from the office, etc.
customer_reviews.author: FeedtheGhosts

customer_reviews.title: I am just glad that ASICS had a non ugly florescence or neon ...
customer_reviews.text: Reviews for shoes can be hard to compare. If you have flat and white feet, then these shoes will support you for experience. That said, I have not exerted them in extreme use. Average use is about an hour a a day, 4-6 days a week of resistance and cardio exercising. I had compared cross training and running shoes, and find that running shoes add more support for people with flat feet. I am just glad that ASICS had a non ugly florescence or neon colored shoe.
customer_reviews.author: John PavlishTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: If you like a lot of padding
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear pure Cadence, I tried these, thought I might want more of a heel, can't do it, they're too squishy. If you like a lot of padding, a lot of cushion, these are the shoes for you. I'm just not used to it, they're good for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes more than I thought I would. They are super comfortable, breathe very well and I have really liked wearing them. I bought them just so I wouldnt sweat in my normal shoes when I excercise. Now I find myself wanting to wear them more often.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: nice pair of casual every days.
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel great. My only complaint and reason for leaving off 1 star is they r just on the snug side. It isn't bad enough that I will return them but it is noticeable for the first 1\2 hour after putting on. Looks like when purchasing ASICS and new balance I'm a size 12 instead of 11.5.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan BP

customer_reviews.title: asics sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I like Asics sneakers. They fit well and I do a lot of walking so I get a new pair about every six months. I walk on the outside of myvleft foot and it causes excess wear that is thecm reason for new sneakers so often.
customer_reviews.author: Jack J. Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Achilles heel
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand I buy. This is my 4th pair of Asics in 2 years. I like the style and look of this shoe overall. It also has very good ventilation. The heel however feels the least protective. I'm a strong walker on my heels and this shoe is uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great shoe from asics
customer_reviews.text: Another great shoe from asics!! My third pair.. have wasted a lot of money on many other brands, that ended up killing my feet!! But i have had the best luck with asics!! Look great. Very durable and fit perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan R.

customer_reviews.title: Barely know that I have them on
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing New balance for some years, but these caught my eye at a price point I could endure. I have not used them for running, but for walking and general moving about they are great - I don't notice them at all - and that is what shoes should do.
customer_reviews.author: Breauxjw

customer_reviews.text: I've only ran in these shoes three times but they are really nice and comfortable. That said I should mention that I only run 3 miles a day at a moderate pace. Also, I underpronate when I run and so far these seem pretty good for that.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S Smith

customer_reviews.title: I've been using Asics Gel running shoes for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Asics Gel running shoes for years and they're my hands-down fave. I don't even bother with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Bagman

customer_reviews.title: I'm in the gym six days a week and love to change up the way I look
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the gym six days a week and love to change up the way I look, including different shoes. After seeing the quality and price I paid, for these, I don't see myself going to Dick's or Academy, for them, any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: jeff salas

customer_reviews.title: I like the design of the shoe but found them to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the shoe but found them to be smaller and narrower than I expected. Normally a 12.5 fits me with room to spare but I could hardly shove my foot into this shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe for the price..
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. When I first got them I thought they were a bit small. But after wearing them for a short time they seemed to conform to my feet. Very comfortable and good arch support.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I work on a college campus and I am walking between buildings which are a fair distance (1-2 miles apart) these sneakers are very comfortable all day and seem to be just what I wanted!

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were the deal of the day, and I have other asics that were not this "basic", but these are very comfortable. I have only worn them twice, both times for the full day and there was no pain at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mozambrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved ASICS shoes, ever since I wrestled as a kid, and these are no exception. These fit well, breathe well, they're comfortable, and they look good. Can't go wrong!

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these for Christmas for my step son, he ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for Christmas for my step son, he didn't start wearing them until the summer. He just showed me that they are coming apart from the sole. (They didn't even make it 4 months). I mostly wear Brooks for running, I think I'm going to be looking for a new brand for him.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these sneakers. Were a great price and fits him perfectly (he wears an 11.5). He uses them to run and lift weights at the gym. Great cross fit sneakers and really nice looking at same time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Metz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe a little narrow but I got wide feet. Length was good great insoles comfortable right out of box. Don't know about quality have not had them but 1 week.

customer_reviews.title: Must Cop
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shoe I have ever worn. The cushioning is great, the look is great, and its a must cop. I recommend the carbon fiber colorway.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable footbed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who has recently been in some pain from plantar fasciitis. When wearing these shoes he is much more comfortable, so they're worth every penny. They have plenty of cushioning inside.

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe Without Excessive Color
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a good pair of running shoes without the gaudy colors these days. I like something I can take a run in or wear with casual wear and the subtle grey of this pair takes care of that.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but not crazy about the fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Men size 10 because my feet are wide and she was somewhat small and narrow. I had to undo the laces very loosely to get my feet in them. And they squeezed the foot as if contouring to it. If you have insole wear in them order a size up

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes and wear them to the gym, but the electric blue is a little more electric than it looks in the picture, thus they are gym only shoes

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort and value.
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable shoes. Wore them the day after they arrived and was able to wear them all day in comfort. I have a lower arch, so for me the support was great. Price was good, they have a good style/appearance.... Money well spent!

customer_reviews.title: ... one size larger than I wear and put the best insoles that finish line sales in them
customer_reviews.text: I bought one size larger than I wear and put the best insoles that finish line sales in them. These are the best running shoes I've ever had. There very easy on my feet a lot of cushion.

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of ASICS. I have a somewhat narrow foot and the ASICS seem to work very well. They are extremely comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes - as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son. Saw these at a sports apparel chain store, but needed a size we could not find. These are just like the ones he tried on in the store. They fit great and my son loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for standing all day at work. My feet still get tired, but not sore. I'd buy them again. ASICS in general are much more durable than Nikes I've owned.

customer_reviews.title: Great basic work out shoes for my son.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these but they do run about a half size small, so I suggest ordering up a half size. Perfect for working out/walking/hiking.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Fits as expected. Has held up well for 6 months and still going strong. No problem with these shoes!

customer_reviews.title: I got my wear out of them. The bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my wear out of them. The bottom of the shoe lasted longer than the top. I gave them to Goodwill before my toe completely poked through the top of the shoe.

customer_reviews.title: These feel very comfortable. These are my work shoes

customer_reviews.text: I don't run but for lots of walking and standing, these are great shoes! Good color and seem to be very durable.

customer_reviews.text: ASICS always makes top quality I use them for running machine training only not for road work. I have another pair for races.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sneakers.

customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box these shoes are comfortable. I love Asics shoes, this is the 3rd pair I have.

customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them and wear them all the time

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these running Asics sneakers was better than expected including comfort, sizing, quality, cost and delivery! I do not know about the durability yet, but I liked them so much that I went ahead and ordered a second pair for a back up.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat em
customer_reviews.text: Saucony is my favorite running shoe and the price is right, these are light yet stable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a first sight love with my boy. I cannot remove them from his feet. Thanks!

customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my husband. He loved them so much, he bought a second pair.

customer_reviews.text: These shoes always fit great and meet my needs. I like how light these shoes are.

customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son. I haven't heard any complaints!

customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Holding up well 4 months later... Not showing any wear.

customer_reviews.title: Look great,  feel great!!
customer_reviews.text: Get many compliments, they fit great, very comfortable. Look great!

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, look and value
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, look and value. This is my third pair of Asics. I run and walk daily and the first two pair lasted four years. I have flat feet and they are also supportive for that. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Grabbed Them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I read the comments ahead of time and ordered a 1/2 size larger than I normally would and they ended up being just the right length. I am on my feet all day at work and these shoes are much more comfortable than my last pair, which I paid more for. Very happy I bought them.

customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son and he absolutely loved them. Perfect and stylish!

customer_reviews.title: Good all around use.

customer_reviews.text: again, nice shoe.. comfortable. I have a semi wide foot and it fits perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Feel great to wear them all day walking.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, and light
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed to shoe that was like his old all black New Balance that are no longer being made. He struggled through a few pairs of shoes and then tried a pair of these Asics Gel Excite, and says they're the best pair yet! He stands all day on concrete floors, and I think these shoes are actually more comfortable than his previous pairs. Sometimes I borrow them to take out the trash, and I can tell they are nice. I might get a women's pair for myself!
customer_reviews.author: fuscia

customer_reviews.title: Defective shoes
customer_reviews.text: The middle pad on the bottom back end of the show is peeling off the sole on both shoes. It's been my experience that once this starts it just gets worse throughout the life of the shoes. Doubtful to buy shoes this way again. Sincerely, Justin Teal
customer_reviews.author: Justin Teal

customer_reviews.text: Not the top of line ASICS, but great value for the price

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fit is very comfortable and I'm able to wear them all day long.

customer_reviews.title: These are BLUE NOT PURPLE.
customer_reviews.text: These are BLUE yet the picture shows PURPLE shoes. They will be BLUE, like the description, NOT PURPLE like the picture. They fit nicely and snugly and feel nice to wear.

customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with these shoes... and as always, great shipping!

customer_reviews.author: Erik R Bonar

product_meta.title: ASICS mens Gel-excite 3
product_meta.description: The Asics GEL-Excite 3 has a breathable mesh upper and GEL Cushioning System for maximum comfort. They also feature structural overlays, reflective accents, removable sockliner, and a durable rubber outsole.
feature_bullets: Low-mileage running shoe featuring rearfoot GEL cushioning and a removable sockliner that accommodates orthotics
AHAR high-abrasion rubber in critical areas of the outsole
